name: Chicken Tetrazzini
ingredients: 1 package (7 ounces) spaghetti, broken into thirds 1 cup whipping (heavy) cream (or regular milk)
steps: This is a simple dinner and super yummy!
¼ cup flour 2 cups cubed cooked chicken or turkey
Chicken base or 4 bouillon cubes 1 can (4 ounces) sliced mushrooms, drained (optional)
¼ teaspoon pepper ½ cup grated parmesan cheese
Heat oven to 350 degrees. Cook and drain spaghetti as directed on package. Melt butter with butter. Cook,
stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and bubbly; remove from heat. Stir in water and whipping
cream. Heat to boiling, stirring constantly. Boil and stir 1 minute. Stir in spaghetti, chicken and mushrooms
Pour spaghetti mixture into ungreased 2 quart casserole dish. Bake uncovered about 30 minutes or until
bubbly in center. With about 5 minutes left sprinkle with cheese.
